channel.title: Current SKill XP
channel.description: How can i use this function to find out how much exp i have gained?

item.title: Current SKill XP
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

I think soemthing like this:

StartingXp :=
CurrentXp :=
then subtract the 2 variables CurrentXp-StrartingXp

Im not sure what the procedure to get your exp would be but look through the srl manual and you will probbaly find it or something.

item.title: Current SKill XP
item.dc:creator: @realrune realrune
item.description:
@realrune wrote:

There’s easier ways to do that then using that function. I suggest counting how much of an item you have mined/fished/etc. and multiplying it by the exp per item mined/fished/etc. If you need help with it i can show you how.

Read full topic

item.title: Current SKill XP
item.dc:creator: @iloveit8 iloveit8
item.description:
@iloveit8 wrote:

uhm… make a var called beginxp and let it equal the amount of xp at the start…
make one var called endxp and let it equal the amout of xp at the end…
and xp you gained is endxp - beginxp…
(soz for the vage discription but i dont know how the function exactly works… so cant help you more than this:()
and why 45 times read without respond?
